location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from H. Wood, Acting Civil Auditor at Fort William to W. Bruce Esquire, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from H. Wood, Acting Civil Auditor at Fort William to W. Bruce Esquire, Acting Resident at Bushire, acquainting that the Accounts of the Residency for July and August 1809 had passed, and requesting to credit in the Residency's account the value of presents transferred by Brigadier General Malcolm's mission.
